DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this this randomized interventional study is to determine if increased level of home-based rehabilitation coupled with a pre-TAVR consultation visit in transcatheter aortic valve replacement patients will improve functional status and quality of life and will decrease hospital readmission.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of severe aortic stenosis (AS) as determined by echocardiography, who are deemed eligible for TAVR by the NYULMC Heart Valve Team Decisional impairment as assessed by the University of California, San Diego Brief Assessment of Capacity to Consent (UBACC) NonEnglish/nonSpanish speaking.
